name: Xala Night Guest House
address: Block 4, Xala Service Area, Phuc La Town, Ha Dong District,, Ha Dong District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Nestled in the heart of Ha Dong District, Xala Night Guest House is an ideal spot from which to discover Hanoi. The city center is merely away and the airport can be reached within 45 minutes. No less exceptional is the hotel's easy access to the city's myriad attractions and landmarks, such as 103 Military Hospital, Phong Kham Da Khoa Thien Nhan, Fine Arts Thien Loc.

Xala Night Guest House offers impeccable service and all the essential amenities to invigorate travelers. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are just a few of the facilities that set Xala Night Guest House apart from other hotels in the city.

The ambiance of Xala Night Guest House is reflected in every guestroom. television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, desk are just some of the facilities that can be found throughout the property. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Xala Night Guest House is a smart choice for travelers to Hanoi, offering a relaxed and hassle-free stay every time.
